46.name: Plant Slayer
46.description: These leafy monsters are now mulch.

99.name: Defending History, Informing the Future
99.description: You are now a full member of the Durmand Priory.
99.requirement: Complete the personal story step "Mightier than the Sword."

200.name: Branded Mine
200.description: Survive the heights of the Branded Mine.

239.name: Slayer
239.description: Nothing but corpses in your wake.

368.name: Coddler's Cove
368.description: Cuddle the hatchlings of Coddler's Cove!

394.name: Fancy Footwork
394.description: You can't be caught that easily.
394.requirement: You've made it through the Swampland fractal in the Fractals of the Mists without triggering a single trap.

435.name: Daily Reviver
435.requirement: Revive a downed or defeated NPC or player.

449.name: Daily Veteran Slayer
449.requirement: Kill veteran or elite foes anywhere in Tyria.

469.name: Krytan Killer
469.requirement: Kill foes that grant experience in the following Krytan maps: Queensdale, Kessex Hills, Gendarran Fields, Harathi Hinterlands, Bloodtide Coast, and Southsun Cove.

542.name: Braham - Retake Cragstead
542.description: Having received no support from Rytlock or Eir, Braham enlists your help to retake Cragstead, in the Wayfarer Foothills, from the Molten Alliance.

596.name: Southsun Shipwreck Sample Collection
596.description: Collect a sample from a shipwreck on the east end of Southsun Shoals.

661.name: The Big Boom in the Big City
661.requirement: The Ship's Council presents a stunning firework display as part of the inaugural Dragon Bash celebrations.

779.name: Pavilion Participant
779.requirement: Complete events in the Crown Pavilion.

833.name: Bane of Invading Captains
833.requirement: Defeat a Champion Aetherblade Captain during a portal invasion.

896.name: Boss Week: Here Be Dragons!
896.requirement: Participate in the Tequatl encounter, or any other world boss encounter,  times.

1061.name: Toxic Gardener
1061.description: Aid in the destruction of toxic offshoots.

1067.name: Toxic Pollen Survival
1067.requirement: Survive in toxic pollen for  pulses.

1086.name: Toxic Gardener
1086.description: Aid in the destruction of toxic offshoots.

1101.name: Toxic Alliance Slayer
1101.requirement: Kill  members of the Toxic Alliance.

1136.name: Tower Explorer
1136.requirement: Find  chamber in the Tower of Nightmares.

1147.name: Fractal Fortnight: Snowblind
1147.description: I'm so cold, my frostbite has frostbite.
1147.requirement: You've completed the Snowblind fractal inside the Fractals of the Mists.

1190.name: Subject 6 Deep-Sixer
1190.description: Make Subject 6 as tough as possible. You can handle it.
1190.requirement: Defeat Subject 6 after causing it to gain maximum stacks of overcharge possible without exploding.

1304.name: Marionette Deregulator
1304.requirement: Defeat each of the marionette's power regulator wardens.

1339.name: Wurm Demolitionist
1339.requirement: Place  powder keg at the base of the cobalt great jungle wurm.

1357.name: Boss Thumper XVII
1357.requirement: Participate in either the fight against the twisted marionette in Lornar's Pass or the fight against the great jungle wurms on Bloodtide Coast.

1535.name: Lost and Found
1535.requirement: Find heirlooms amid the wreckage of the city.

1746.name: Winter's Weapon Collection
1746.description: <c=@flavor>Show your celebratory Wintersday side all year around!</c>
1746.requirement: Unlock all  Winter's weapon skins in your wardrobe.

1759.name: World Contributor Round 4
1759.requirement: Participate in round four of the tournament. Complete any  WvW event this week.

1779.name: Luminescent Footwear
1779.requirement: Collect the  parts required to assemble Luminescent Boots.

1802.name: The Annihilator
1802.requirement: Slay the Legendary Mordrem Annihilator. Appears rarely around Red Rock Bastion when controlled by the Pact.

1821.name: No Teragriff Pack Snack
1821.description: Story Instance: Tracking the Aspect Masters
1821.requirement: Defeat the Mordrem teragriff without being hit by its malformed allies.

1887.name: Daily Portmatt's Lab Jumping Puzzle
1887.requirement: Complete the Professor Portmatt's Lab jumping puzzle in Bloodtide Coast.

1936.name: Daily Shiverpeaks Vista Viewer
1936.description: Always on the lookout for a good view.
1936.requirement: View a vista in one of the following Shiverpeak Mountains maps: Wayfarer Foothills, Snowden Drifts, Lornar's Pass, Dredgehaunt Cliffs, Timberline Falls, and Frostgorge Sound.

1948.name: Daily Bloodtide Coast Event Completer
1948.requirement: Complete events in Bloodtide Coast in Kryta.

2078.name: Dragon's Heart
2078.requirement: Gain health while in the Dragon Ball arena.

2191.name: Daily Fractal Adept
2191.requirement: Complete  different scale 1–20 fractal in the Fractals of the Mists through the portal in Lion's Arch.

2201.name: Prisoners of the Dragon
2201.description: Journal: Prisoners of the Dragon Completed

2213.name: The Minstrel II: The Perfected Focus
2213.description: Your first attempt at crafting the legendary precursor The Bard has been modestly successful but has not yet yielded the weapon you ultimately desire. This journey has only just begun. Find a teacher, research your procedures, and hone your skills before you try a second time.

bits.text: Speak to a Master Artificer to learn his needs for the war effort.
Speak to a Master Artificer to discover the art of magical woodworking.
Speak to a Master Artificer to discover the secret to polishing a focus core.
Speak to a Master Artificer to discover the art of magical woodworking.
Speak to a Master Artificer to discover the secret to balancing a focus casing.
Speak to Scholar Mossi in the Trader's Forum in Lion's Arch to learn her needs for applied research in Desert Magics.
Speak to Scholar Mossi in the Trader's Forum in Lion's Arch to learn her needs for applied research in Jungle Magics.
Speak to Scholar Mossi in the Trader's Forum in Lion's Arch to learn her needs for applied research in Old World Magics.
Speak to Scholar Mossi in the Trader's Forum in Lion's Arch to learn her needs for applied research in Ancient Water Magics.
Speak to Scholar Mossi in the Trader's Forum in Lion's Arch to learn her needs for applied research in Stabilizing Magics.
Purchased from Grandmaster Craftsman Hobbs after training the Magister of Legends ability in the Legendary Crafting Mastery Track.

2237.name: Regurgicidal
2237.requirement: Defeat the great skelk regurgitant in Tangled Depths.

2325.name: Machined Short Bow
2325.requirement: Collect all  items to forge your Machined Short Bow.

bits.text: Purchased from Itzel vendors for airship parts.
Purchased from Exalted vendors for aurillium.
Purchased from Nuhoch vendors for ley-line crystals.
Charge an oiled weapon component at a place of power in the Heart of Maguuma.
Found in Noxious Pods in Dragon's Stand.

2370.name: Auric Basin Explorer
2370.requirement: Explore all areas in Auric Basin.

2376.name: Northern Tower Taker
2376.description: You sure showed that tower who was boss.
2376.requirement: Capture the Northern Blighting Tower in Dragon's Stand.

2383.name: Kudzu III: Leaf of Kudzu
2383.description: Within sight of a great volcano lies a hidden garden that you must make your own. Tame and raise the plants within this hidden garden to master their secrets, channeling that power into your efforts to create the legendary precursor Leaf of Kudzu.

bits.text: Plant carrot seeds in your hidden garden in Mount Maelstrom. Carrot seeds can be found while harvesting carrots.
Plant chili-pepper seeds in your hidden garden in Mount Maelstrom. Chili-pepper seeds can be found while harvesting chili peppers.
Plant spinach seeds in your hidden garden in Mount Maelstrom. Spinach seeds can be found while harvesting spinach.
Plant strawberry seeds in your hidden garden in Mount Maelstrom. Strawberry seeds can be found while harvesting strawberries.
Plant cabbage seeds in your hidden garden in Mount Maelstrom. Cabbage seeds can be found while harvesting cabbage.
Plant zucchini seeds in your hidden garden in Mount Maelstrom. Zucchini seeds can be found while harvesting zucchini.
Plant pumpkin seeds in your hidden garden in Mount Maelstrom. Pumpkin seeds can be found while harvesting pumpkins.
Plant butternut-squash seeds in your hidden garden in Mount Maelstrom. Butternut-squash seeds can be found while harvesting butternut squash.
Plant raspberry seeds in your hidden garden in Mount Maelstrom. Raspberry seeds can be found while harvesting raspberries.
Plant blackberry seeds in your hidden garden in Mount Maelstrom. Blackberry seeds can be found while harvesting blackberries.
Plant ghost-pepper seeds in your hidden garden in Mount Maelstrom. Ghost-pepper seeds can be found while harvesting ghost peppers.
Plant omnomberry seeds in your hidden garden in Mount Maelstrom. Omnomberry seeds can be found while harvesting omnomberries.
Find an unbreakable garden trowel from an enemy guarding a garden.
Gather guano from bats and use it to fertilize your hidden garden in Mount Maelstrom.
Gather a partially digested fish carcass from a shark, and use it to fertilize your hidden garden in Mount Maelstrom.
Find a cow pie in Queensdale or Diessa Plateau and use it to fertilize your hidden garden in Mount Maelstrom.
Find compost in an heirloom seed pouch and use it to fertilize your hidden garden in Mount Maelstrom.
Gather bone meal from Tequatl the Sunless, and use it to fertilize your hidden garden in Mount Maelstrom.
Gather bone meal from a Champion Risen Megalodon in Orr, and use it to fertilize your hidden garden in Mount Maelstrom.
Gather bone meal from the Risen High Wizard at the Gates of Arah in Cursed Shore, and use it to fertilize your hidden garden in Mount Maelstrom.
Gather bone meal from the Risen King in the Royal Tombs of Cursed Shore, and use it to fertilize your hidden garden in Mount Maelstrom.
Gather bone meal from a Risen Giant, and use it to fertilize your hidden garden in Mount Maelstrom.
Use a bucket purchased from Milton Book in Gendarran Fields and fill it with water from the Uplands Oasis in Dry Top. Then use it to water your hidden garden.
Use a bucket purchased from Milton Book in Gendarran Fields and fill it with water from the secret grotto in the Garden of Dawn in the Grove. Then use it to water your hidden garden.
Use a bucket purchased from Milton Book in Gendarran Fields and fill it with water from the Cluster of Waves in Dierdre's Steps in Mount Maelstrom. Then use it to water your hidden garden.
Use a bucket purchased from Milton Book in Gendarran Fields and fill it with water from the Hope Falls in Malchor's Leap. Then use it to water your hidden garden.
Use a bucket purchased from Milton Book in Gendarran Fields and fill it with water from the mineral pools in Southsun Cove. Then use it to water your hidden garden.
Purchased from Grandmaster Craftsman Hobbs after training the Historian of the Armaments ability in the Legendary Crafting Mastery Track.

2420.name: Twilight I: The Experimental Nightsword
2420.description: All things must end, all kingdoms must perish, and every day must finish in the fall of night. Consider the finality of all things by meditating on the transience of power and glory throughout Tyria, all in order to take your first steps in creating the legendary precursor known as Dusk.
2420.locked_text: Unlock the Mastery ability Revered Antiquarian in the Legendary Crafting Mastery line, and speak to Grandmaster Craftsman Hobbs in Lion's Arch.

bits.text: A gift from the ghost of Elise after helping Fen visit her grave in the Bonerattler Caverns of Harathi Hinterlands.
Cleanse the Cathedral of Zephyrs in Malchor's Leap and loot this from the chest.
Visit the Vizier's Tower, where the fall of Orr originated, and loot this from the chest there.
Read about the end of the Ascalonian human civilization at the Shards of War in the Plains of Ashford.
Examine the wreckage of the Breachmaker in Lion's Arch.
Examine the wreckage of the clockwork marionette in Lornar's Pass.
Experience the meltdown of the Thaumanova Reactor in the Fractals of the Mists, and loot this from the chest.
Experience the end of Mai Trin in the Fractals of the Mists, and loot this from her chest.
Experience the end of the Molten Alliance Leaders in the Fractals of the Mists, and loot this from their chest.
Defeat the Toxic Alchemist in Kessex Hills and loot this from her corpse.
Sink the Ash Horizon in Sparkfly Fen.
Destroy the Inquest research facility at Bauxite Alchemicals in Malchor's Leap, and loot this from the chest there.
Defeat Taidha Covington in Bloodtide Coast and loot this from her chest.
Defeat the Harathi Overlord in Kessex Hills and loot this from his corpse.
Defeat the Modniir Ulgoth in Harathi Hinterlands and loot this from his chest.

2491.name: Daily Recommended Fractal—Scale 17
2491.requirement: Complete  scale 17 fractal in the Fractals of the Mists through the portal in Lion's Arch.

2586.name: Improvised Weapon Collection
2586.requirement: Unlock all  Improvised weapon skins in your wardrobe.

2643.name: Lightbringer's Pack
2643.requirement: Collect all  items to construct your Lightbringer's Pack.

bits.text: Exchange Pact rations at Order of Whispers weapon and armor merchants in the Chantry of Secrets.
Complete the Heart of Thorns Act II Mastery achievement.
Successfully complete the Tangled Depths map meta-event cycle.
Purchased from Itzel vendors for airship parts.
Defeat the Tarnished Traitor. (Requires Exalted Purification.)
Defeat Mayatl the Fierce. (Requires Itzel Leadership)
Defeat Potoni the Massive. (Requires Nuhoch Proving)

2689.name: Wings of Glory—Recruit
2689.description: Completing this achievement advances the meta-achievement Path of the Ascension I: The Thrill of Battle.
2689.requirement: Purchase 1 Recruit's Wings of Glory from the League Vendor.

2738.name: Path of the Ascension I: The Thrill of Battle
2738.requirement: Complete all 11 Path of Ascension I achievements.

2782.name: Sounds of the Season
2782.description: Getting the right notes is harder than expected.
2782.requirement: Complete songs in the Bell Choir  time during Wintersday.

2890.name: Daily Tier 3 Volcanic
2890.requirement: Complete Volcanic at fractal scale 51 or higher.

2914.name: Daily Caudecus's Manor
2914.requirement: Complete any path in the Caudecus's Manor explorable dungeon.

2946.name: Chuka and Champawat III: Naturalist's Journal
2946.description: "I set out again with Cymbel as my guide, this time to understand. I now want these pages to capture not my greatness, but the greatness of the creature I pursued."
2946.locked_text: Bring a crude leather book to Cymbel after gaining her trust.

bits.text: Bring a crude leather book to Cymbel after gaining her trust.
Consult your Naturalist's Journal for instructions.
Consult your Naturalist's Journal for instructions.
Consult your Naturalist's Journal for instructions.
Consult your Naturalist's Journal for instructions.
Consult your Naturalist's Journal for instructions.
Consult your Naturalist's Journal for instructions.
Consult your Naturalist's Journal for instructions.
Consult your Naturalist's Journal for instructions.
Consult your Naturalist's Journal for instructions.
Consult your Naturalist's Journal for instructions.
Consult your Naturalist's Journal for instructions.
Consult your Naturalist's Journal for instructions.
Consult your Naturalist's Journal for instructions.
Consult your Naturalist's Journal for instructions.
Consult your Naturalist's Journal for instructions.

3121.name: Verm the Burnin' Wurm
3121.description: "It's just a wurm that shoots fire. What could go wrong?"—Cami
3121.requirement: Slay the lava wurm Vermignus near Fractured Caldera.

3148.name: Return of the Jade Construct
3148.description: What's a little magma between enemies?
3148.requirement: Slay the pyroclastic jade construct near Caliph's Steps.

3216.name: Precocious Aurene
3216.requirement: Train Aurene to be a well-behaved young dragon.

3266.name: A Season of Merriment
3266.requirement: Complete the Wintersday Cheer achievement five times over the course of the Wintersday festival. The Wintersday Cheer achievement is located in the Daily tab.

3268.name: Finders Keepers
3268.description: Your greed ruined someone else's Wintersday. Jerk.
3268.requirement: Pick up a dropped present while escorting a donation dolyak in Divinity's Reach.

3313.name: Silent Storm Defender
3313.requirement: Defeat  enemy while defending your team's capture points during Temple of the Silent Storm rated matches.

3320.name: Dance Club
3320.description: It was all a blur to him, though.

3355.name: Lord Slayer
3355.requirement: Earn glory in Legacy of the Foefire by completing these achievements.

3357.name: Dusk's Champion
3357.description: Do you have what it takes to battle alongside a champion?
3357.requirement: Earn glory in the Battle of Champion's Dusk by completing these achievements.

3417.name: Daily Draconis Mons Volcanic Diver
3417.requirement: Acquire diving goggles near the gate of fire, and dive into the bucket floating in the boiling sea.

3421.name: Nature's Wrath
3421.requirement: Slay the champion greater wardbough near Savage Rise.

3465.name: Mind Out of Time
3465.description: Bling-9009 has received reports of your exploits and now carries new items!
3465.requirement: Accept the harbinger's challenge and defeat the mastermind in the Shattered Observatory fractal.

3604.name: Flameseeker Prophecies
3604.description: Glint foretold the Fall of Orr, the Searing of Ascalon, the rise of the White Mantle, and the defeat of the Unseen Ones.
3604.requirement: Discover and decrypt verses of the Flameseeker Prophecies within Augury Rock.

3656.name: Desert Highlands Insight: Palace of Aban
3656.requirement: Discover this Crystal Desert Mastery Insight in the Desert Highlands.

3694.name: Vabbian Griffon Expert: Silver
3694.requirement: Fly your griffon through the rings as quickly as you can!

3771.name: A Redeemer's Friend
3771.description: The Order of Shadows has a greater plan for Redeemer Kossan—a position that only he can fill.
3771.requirement: After completing successful patrols with Redeemer Kossan, speak with him again once he's talked to Keeper Pamir.

3887.name: Praise Joko!
3887.requirement: Stand in front of and salute all of the Palawa Joko statues within the Domain of Vabbi.

3947.name: The Sun Is Silent for This One
3947.requirement: Unlock  Funerary Armor Skins by purchasing them from the Primeval Steward in the Tomb of Primeval Kings after completing the appropriate collections.

bits.text: Complete the rare collection "Walk the Land" and purchase from the Primeval Steward in the Tomb of Primeval Kings in the Desert Highlands.
Complete the rare collection "Glorify the Golden Heart" and purchase from the Primeval Steward in the Tomb of Primeval Kings in the Desert Highlands.
Complete the rare collection "Exaltation of the Guardians" and purchase from the Primeval Steward in the Tomb of Primeval Kings in the Desert Highlands.
Complete the rare collection "Washing the Brow" and purchase from the Primeval Steward in the Tomb of Primeval Kings in the Desert Highlands.
Complete the rare collection "The Collection of Tribute" and purchase from the Primeval Steward in the Tomb of Primeval Kings in the Desert Highlands.
Complete the rare collection "Recitation of the Litany of Deeds" and purchase from the Primeval Steward in the Tomb of Primeval Kings in the Desert Highlands.
Complete the rare collection "Walk the Land" and purchase from the Primeval Steward in the Tomb of Primeval Kings in the Desert Highlands.
Complete the rare collection "Glorify the Golden Heart" and purchase from the Primeval Steward in the Tomb of Primeval Kings in the Desert Highlands.
Complete the rare collection "Exaltation of the Guardians" and purchase from the Primeval Steward in the Tomb of Primeval Kings in the Desert Highlands.
Complete the rare collection "Washing the Brow" and purchase from the Primeval Steward in the Tomb of Primeval Kings in the Desert Highlands.
Complete the rare collection "The Collection of Tribute" and purchase from the Primeval Steward in the Tomb of Primeval Kings in the Desert Highlands.
Complete the rare collection "Recitation of the Litany of Deeds" and purchase from the Primeval Steward in the Tomb of Primeval Kings in the Desert Highlands.
Complete the rare collection "Walk the Land" and purchase from the Primeval Steward in the Tomb of Primeval Kings in the Desert Highlands.
Complete the rare collection "Glorify the Golden Heart" and purchase from the Primeval Steward in the Tomb of Primeval Kings in the Desert Highlands.
Complete the rare collection "Exaltation of the Guardians" and purchase from the Primeval Steward in the Tomb of Primeval Kings in the Desert Highlands.
Complete the rare collection "Washing the Brow" and purchase from the Primeval Steward in the Tomb of Primeval Kings in the Desert Highlands.
Complete the rare collection "The Collection of Tribute" and purchase from the Primeval Steward in the Tomb of Primeval Kings in the Desert Highlands.
Complete the rare collection "Recitation of the Litany of Deeds" and purchase from the Primeval Steward in the Tomb of Primeval Kings in the Desert Highlands.

4024.name: Hollow Victory
4024.description: You committed the ultimate betrayal. Your weakness cannot be forgiven.
4024.requirement: Complete the Twilight Oasis fractal on the Master tier.

4025.name: Daily Domain of Istan Awakened Slayer
4025.requirement: Kill 25 Awakened in the Domain of Istan.

4027.name: Library Detective
4027.requirement: Collect overdue library books—through whatever means necessary.

4063.name: Dedicated Gardener
4063.description: <c=@flavor>All things have a right to grow.</c>
4063.requirement: Collect all plantable seeds for your home garden. Seeds have a chance to drop while gathering from harvesting nodes that produce that resource. Resource synthesizers in Guild Halls and World vs. World don't create seeds.
4063.locked_text: Unlock your home garden to access this collection.

4091.name: The Charge
4091.requirement: Stop Joko's invasion and rescue Taimi's friends.

4110.name: Light Speed
4110.description: Engage in a test of intellect developed by the Inquest.
4110.requirement: Activate the 4 door controls in the Invariant Enclave Lab in under 35 seconds.

4199.name: [FTT 101-107] Core Turret Dynamics
4199.requirement: Find enough schematic scraps off of Awakened Inquest to complete all seven turret types.
4199.locked_text: A basic understanding of field tech turret dynamics is required.

4374.name: Philanthropist
4374.description: "Could be you or me, one of these days. Never know." —Ira
4374.requirement: Donate to refugee relief efforts in Sun's Refuge.

4381.name: Hunted
4381.requirement: Track down and defeat the Branded hydra terrorizing dolyak routes in Jahai Bluffs.

4390.name: Run Around for No Reason: Gold
4390.requirement: Participate in a delightful romp at the suggestion of an old acquaintance—and do it really well.

4399.name: Daily Jahai Bluffs Branded Awakened Champions Defeater
4399.requirement: Defeat 3 Branded Awakened leaders in Yatendi, Argon Garrison, or Crescent's Prosperity.

4523.name: Chasing Tales: Carver the Carver
4523.requirement: Acquire a Dragonsblood sword and perform tasks to re-create Carver's legend.

bits.text: Acquire the tome entry Chasing Tales: Carver the Carver.
Acquire the heroic spirit of Carver: deed #1.
Acquire the heroic spirit of Carver: deed #2.
Acquire the heroic spirit of Carver: deed #3.
Meet with the spirit of Carver at a heroic font.

4573.name: Chasing Tales: Codd the Cheerful
4573.requirement: Acquire a dragon crystal warhorn and perform tasks to recreate Codd's legend.

bits.text: Acquire the tome entry called Chasing Tales: Codd the Cheerful.
Acquire the heroic spirit of Codd: deed #1.
Acquire the heroic spirit of Codd: deed #2.
Acquire the heroic spirit of Codd: deed #3.
Meet with the spirit of Codd at a heroic font.

4584.name: Chasing Tales: Thundering Blow
4584.description: Katarin's foes learned to mistrust the ground beneath their feet.
4584.requirement: Knock down, stun, or launch opponents 20 times while wielding a hammer.

bits.text: Knocked down, stunned, or launched opponents 20 times while wielding a hammer.

4594.name: Power Player
4594.description:
Story Instance: Scion & Champion

Hint: A veteran ogre appears each time a crystal reaches a 50% charge.
4594.requirement: Charge three crystals with the magic of veteran Branded foes.

4600.name: The Master of Music
4600.requirement: Practice the resonating crystal ritual with six Zephyrites.

4642.name: Warclaw Companion
4642.description: It takes a strong will to master the warclaw.
4642.requirement: Complete the following tasks to earn the mighty warclaw mount.

4687.name: My Beautiful Infrastructure
4687.description: If rewards were not granted on completion, they can be purchased from the traveling Elonian trader in Dragonfall.
4687.requirement: Participate in / bridge defense or bridge repair events in Dragonfall.

4751.name: Daily Dragonfall Underworld Creature Slayer
4751.requirement: Kill 25 creatures from the Underworld in Dragonfall.

4766.name: Mystic Forge "Researcher" I
4766.requirement: Donate goods to the "very scientific" research into the Mystic Forge's secrets in Lion's Arch.

4804.name: Baron of the Arena
4804.requirement: Finish the season in 26th–100th place on the skill rating leaderboard.

4830.name: Arena Slayer
4830.requirement: Defeat the first 5 holographic champions in the Dragon Arena.

4832.name: (Annual) Piñata Pummeler
4832.requirement: Earn a silver medal in the Piñata Bashing adventure in Hoelbrak. This achievement can be completed once per year.

4856.name: Bonus Event: World Boss Rush
4856.description: Defeat world bosses around Tyria to earn bonus rewards!

4906.name: Daily Grothmar Valley Vista Viewer
4906.requirement: View any vista in Grothmar Valley.

4959.name: Generation Gap
4959.requirement: Defeat 25 angry charr youth at Fangstorm's home.

4968.name: Icebrood Saga Reward Track (PvP)
4968.requirement: Complete any Living World Icebrood Saga Reward Track.

4971.name: Divide by Zero
4971.requirement: Defeat the Ooze Pit's grand champion without allowing any divisions in the final phase.

4990.name: Under Her Wing
4990.requirement: Complete Kasmeer's training without a single cub being transported away.

5043.name: Bjora Marches Insight: Asgeir's Legacy
5043.requirement: Discover this Icebrood Saga Mastery Insight in Bjora Marches.

5091.name: Timber!
5091.requirement: Take damage from a falling tree.

5221.name: Visions of the Past: Tower Hybrid Master
5221.description: Get a flawless victory against your enemy inside the Tower of Nightmares. [This mission is now playable in Living World Season 1: Episode 4.]
5221.requirement: Defeat the toxic hybrid without any party members dying.

5272.name: 3v3 Contender
5272.requirement: Complete the final league chest during a 3v3 mini-season.

5285.name: Purrfect Escape
5285.description:
Story Instance: Turnabout
It's raining cats and dogs out there.
Except the cats are Dominion ordnance, and the dogs are also Dominion ordnance.
5285.requirement: Retreat to the base without being hit.

5303.name: Drizzlewood Coast Insight: Waterfall's Nexus
5303.requirement: Discover this Icebrood Saga Mastery Insight in the Drizzlewood Coast.

5326.name: Drizzlewood Coast Insight: Meditative Falls
5326.requirement: Discover this Icebrood Saga Mastery Insight in the Drizzlewood Coast.

5363.name: Sanguine Sniper
5363.description: Too much of a good thing?
5363.requirement: Use the blood collector as a weapon against your enemies.

5512.name: Champion's End
5512.requirement: Complete the story chapter Champion's End.

5550.name: League Slayer—2v2 Season Three
5550.requirement: Defeat  players in ranked matches during 2v2 Season Three.

5571.name: Daily Fields of Ruin Dragon Response Mission
5571.requirement: Complete the Fields of Ruin Dragon Response Mission.

5590.name: Emergency Dragon Responder: Lake Doric
5590.requirement: Complete the Lake Doric Dragon Response Mission.

5612.name: Kodan Global Ranks
5612.requirement: Speak with the kodan field leader in the Eye of the North once the global support goals are met.

5649.name: Daily Bloodtide Coast Dragon Response Mission
5649.requirement: Complete the Bloodtide Coast Dragon Response Mission.

5774.name: Return to Taimi's Game
5774.requirement: Complete the mission Taimi's Game in Living World Season 3 Episode 2.

5781.name: Revenge of the High Sage
5781.requirement: Defeat the Harathi High Sage and the massive earth elemental it summons.

5877.name: Return to The End
5877.requirement: Complete the story mission The End in Living World Season 4 Episode 6.

5986.name: Treasure Hunter: Bjora Marches
5986.requirement: Loot  essence chests in Bjora Marches.

6036.name: (Weekly) Halloween Festivities
6036.description: Weekly achievement. Progress resets on Monday morning.
6036.requirement: Participate in the Mad King's Labyrinth, Halloween races, the Mad King's Clock Tower or Stopped Clock Tower, Mad King Says, and Ascent to Madness. Progress awarded varies based on the activity.

6043.name: League Conqueror—Conquest Season Twenty-Nine
6043.requirement: Win  ranked matches during Conquest Season Twenty-Nine.

6098.name: Adept Virtuoso
6098.requirement: Begin training the mesmer's virtuoso elite specialization.

6106.name: Desert Isles Fisher
6106.description: <c=@flavor>The charm of fishing is in pursuing something elusive, though attainable. It is a simple yet profound practice of hope.</c>
6106.requirement: Collect  different fish from the isles off the coast of Elona.

6264.description: <c=@flavor>The charm of fishing is in pursuing something elusive, though attainable. It is a simple yet profound practice of hope.</c>
6264.requirement: Collect  different fish from the waterways around Seitung Province.

6337.name: Crushing Weight
6337.requirement: Collect these  items and skins to receive the untamed's hammer, Crushing Weight.
6337.locked_text: Begin training the ranger's untamed elite specialization.

bits.text: Begin training the ranger's untamed elite specialization.
Completely train the ranger's untamed elite specialization.
Combine an Oiled Large Ancient Haft, 25 Globs of Ectoplasm, Chunks of Jade, and Chunks of Petrified Echovald Resin in the Mystic Forge.
As a ranger, complete the Seitung Province meta-event.
As a ranger, complete the Echovald Wilds meta-event.
As a ranger, complete the Ankka story instance or strike.
As an untamed, complete the End of Dragons storyline or the Battle for the Jade Sea meta-event.
Catch a stingray in Seitung Province.
Purchased from the crafting research vendor in Dragon's End.
Purchased from the crafting research vendor at New Kaineng City.
Earned by defeating naga enemies in Seitung Province.
Earn map completion in Dragon's End as a ranger.
As an untamed, defeat a Champion Warden in Echovald Wilds.
Acquired from petrified Echovald saplings as a ranger.

6397.name: Hide-and-Seek in Arborstone
6397.requirement: Win 20 games of hide-and-seek with the tengu fledgling in Arborstone.

6409.name: Eternal Seitung Province Meta-Event
6409.requirement: Defeat the Aetherblade leader in Haiju Plains.

6505.name: Aquatic Treasure Collector
6505.requirement: Collect these  valuable junk items by fishing throughout Tyria.

6525.name: Steel Lotus Weapon Collection
6525.requirement: Unlock all  Steel Lotus weapon skins in your wardrobe.

6532.name: Voidwalker
6532.requirement: Complete the Harvest Temple Strike Mission with challenge mode active without allowing the enemy to gain more than three stacks of Void Empowerment.

6620.name: Viewing Vistas
6620.requirement:
View / vista.

<c=@reminder>Vistas are scenic locations that show the world from a new perspective, and they are marked with a red triangle icon on the map.</c>

6684.name: Clockwork Invasion
6684.requirement: Complete the story chapter Clockwork Invasion.

6686.name: Scarlet's Playhouse
6686.requirement: Complete the story chapter Scarlet's Playhouse.

6708.name: Traveler of Four Winds
6708.requirement: Participate in the Labyrinthine Cliffs treasure hunt or defeat any champion enemies across Tyria.

6741.name: Selecting Crafting Disciplines
6741.requirement:
Train in a crafting discipline from a crafting master.

<c=@reminder>Items can be crafted at crafting stations in cities and guild halls once you've been trained by an appropriate master craftsman. Crafting uses the crafting materials you collect from gathering nodes and defeated enemies as you explore the world.</c>

6753.name: Tower Purifier
6753.requirement: Complete events in the Tower of Nightmares to bring an end to its twisted evils.

6758.name: Awake and Allied
6758.requirement: Complete the story chapter Awake and Allied.

6862.name: Party Animal
6862.requirement: Pet all the animals at the Red Duck Teahouse.

6869.name: Don't Mind If I Do!
6869.description: Rama ordered all that food... Would be a shame to let it go to waste!
6869.requirement: Eat all of the food possible at Rama's party.

6879.name: Sleuthing a Solution
6879.requirement: Listen to all of Gorrik's journal entries.

6963.name: I Got a Golden Ticket
6963.description: Next step: discern how to swim in gold coins, which, despite how easily they slip through your fingers, remain solid rather than fluid.
6963.requirement: Purchase a golden ticket in the Wizard's Tower.

6970.name: Skyscale Target Practice in Skywatch Archipelago: Silver
6970.requirement: Earn a silver medal or better in the Skyscale Target Practice in Skywatch Archipelago adventure.

6990.name: Knowledge of the Elders
6990.requirement: Learn more about the Bastion of Knowledge and the Seer to acquire a powerful and ancient weapon.

bits.text: Purchase an Essence of Knowledge from the Faction Provisioner at the Bastion of Knowledge
Assist in Closing a Tentacle Rift in the Bastion of Knowledge
Defeat the Boss in the Hall of Secrets
Defeat the Boss in the Bastion of Knowledge's Library
Stop the Massive Kryptis at the Top of the World Spire
Look around Isgarren's Office in the Wizard's Tower
Take the Artifact to Someone Knowledgeable about Seers
Travel to the Entrance of the Bloodstone Caves

7026.name: Master of the Rifts
7026.description: Master your own fear. Only then can you defeat a king.
7026.requirement: Take down tier 1, tier 2, and tier 3 rift hunt targets in various maps.

7048.name: Sorrow's Lost
7048.description: Waiting Sorrow guarded these cards with her life, so why did she leave them behind...?
7048.requirement: Locate each of the Oracle cards.

bits.text: Dadga needs to speak with you in the Wizard's Tower.
All convoys must have a starting point, just as all climbs must have a place where you can start your ascent.

Flying books, treaties on centaur mating rituals, six hundred and fifty-seven thousand, eight hundred and ninety-one words about the uses of moa feathers can be found here. What else could be found between the shelves?
Someone in Amnytas is going beyond just closing rifts, but one must weigh the pros and cons of probing the unknown. Help them survive the ordeal.
Reports of wizard magic in Frostgorge Sound, just the smallest drop in a sea. A sorrowful one has found a prize...
Nobody knows what is stashed in the depths of deepest halls of knowledge, but someone in Amnytas is trying to find out...
Skywatch Archipelago is the gateway to many realities, but it would be folly to assume this tower was "the" tower.
The Kryptis flood the skies; the Heart thrums whenever they are near. Hunt down their incursions across the bastions or fractals and find your prize
Wizards fight with more than spells and swords—they concoct all sorts of brews as well. Seek out and aid this master while they test their creations.
Many things whisper in Amnytas that should not: doors, books, and spirits. Hunt them down and trace their source.
Buried in Rata Sum are many labs, but this one is so full of memory, it hurts.
Among the fractals of the archipelago, enormous amounts of emotional energy is coalescing. Help the gatherers and find your answers.
Magic can be used to heal, transmute, and inspire, but for this bastion, they focus on battle. Learn the poses and complete the spell.
If only magical barriers were as easy to maintain as waving a wand. It takes work and undying focus, and these barriers must not fall.
The queen's shadows meet in secret under the Shadow of Grenth.
A hobby that requires only two things: patience and water. Maybe a clue can be found if one also takes the practice?
Rifts let things through and others in. Search the fields where the fiend vanished, and someone nearby may have some answers.
The tower climbs high and holds infinite secrets. If one climbs high enough, maybe those secrets will reveal themselves...
If one is looking for the stars, there is only one bastion where they are found.
The charr have always shunned the rejects in their citadel; search the shadows thoroughly and cast a light to those creatures in the darkness.
Magic in Amnytas is always temperamental, but with the Kryptis attack it's running amok. Once statuesque, this place needs a helping hand.
Amnytas is suffering, but those who seek balance are suffering worst of all. Why debate it? Break open the hall and help them find peace.
The beast emerges, the spire entwined... Put out the eyes, each and every one.
Now that you have found every card, return to Dagda in the Wizard's Tower.

7140.name: Faith Is My Shield
7140.requirement: Use /kneel in front of the fallen statue of Joko.

7159.name: Protector of Jade Mech Habitation Zone 03
7159.requirement: Successfully complete events around Jade Mech Habitation Zone 03.

bits.text: Defend the Kestrel supplies from the naga.
Help the Kestrels search for survivors. (Event 1 of 2)
Subdue the Ministry of Transit agent.
Help Min-Ji set up emergency broadcast stations. (Event 2 of 2)
Defeat Dexicos the Covetous by destroying artifacts.

7180.name: Sin-Eater
7180.requirement: Unlock all  Sinful weapon skins by completing Strike Missions in Secrets of the Obscure.

7181.name: Sandswept Isles Incursions
7181.requirement: Repel Kryptis incursions in the Sandswept Isles.

7192.name: Wizard's Tower Trial
7192.description: Just a hop, skip, and...a lot of jumps away!

7380.name: Dragon Response Delver
7380.requirement: Complete any Dragon Response Mission launched from the Eye of the North. Recommended for level 80. May contain spoilers for the fifth episode of the Icebrood Saga story.

7499.name: Fractal Rush Elite
7499.requirement: Complete  different scale 51–100 fractal in the Fractals of the Mists through the portal in Lion's Arch.

7525.name: Black Lion Stolen Goods Recovery Event Week 2—Basic
7525.description: The Black Lion Trading Company needs your help collecting stolen goods!
7525.requirement: Collect stolen Black Lion supplies from thieving skritt during the event.

7634.name: Seitung Province Incursions
7634.requirement: Repel Kryptis incursions in Seitung Province.

7646.name: Time Unwaiting
7646.requirement: Complete the Mad King's Clock Tower jumping puzzle.

7667.name: Desert Highlands Rift Hunting
7667.requirement: Take down tier 1, tier 2, and tier 3 rift hunt targets in Desert Highlands.

7673.name: Inner Nayos Insight: Memory's Hollow
7673.requirement: Discover this Secrets of the Obscure Mastery Insight in Inner Nayos.

7674.name: Malchor's Leap Rift Hunting
7674.requirement: Take down tier 1, tier 2, and tier 3 rift hunt targets in Malchor's Leap.

7687.name: Follow the Leader
7687.requirement: Aid the Astral Ward in clearing out Kryptis patrol leaders and the lieutenant in Heitor's Dominion in Inner Nayos.

7710.name: Duress
7710.requirement: Catch up with the Wizard's Court and journey through the rifts.

7719.name: Snoren on the Job
7719.requirement: Help retrieve the supplies stolen from Snoren and Norrag.

7766.name: League Participator—Conquest Season Forty
7766.requirement: Play  ranked matches during Conquest Season Forty.

7782.name: Inner Nayos: Defiled Cradle Savior
7782.description: Preventing Eparch's allies from draining resources from the land.
7782.requirement: Successfully complete unique events in Defiled Cradle in Inner Nayos.

bits.text: Protect Koris from the tendrils of Nourys.
Use caustic grenades to weaken extractors. (Event 1 of 2)
Find and destroy the tentacles of Nourys. (Event 1 of 3)
Use your skyscale to intercept magic around the extractor. (Event 2 of 3)

7815.name: Eventide's March
7815.requirement: Join Nephus and take on Queen Labris.

7893.name: Legendary Paragon
7893.requirement: Win  rated arena game as a guardian.

8042.name: Lonely Tower Fractal
8042.requirement: Complete all the achievements associated with the Lonely Tower fractal.

8081.name: Free Kryptis Essence: Master
8081.requirement: Finish the Free Kryptis Essence adventure with 22 or more essence freed.

8090.name: Reuniting Lost Kryptis: Silver
8090.requirement:
Earn a silver medal or better in the Reuniting Lost Kryptis adventure.

(Progress will update when you claim the rewards from this adventure.)

8125.name: Sunken Treasure Week: Aquatic Ruins
8125.requirement: Find and open a sunken chest at the end of the Aquatic Ruins fractal.

8239.name: It's Going to Be a Long Day
8239.requirement: Find and read all the Tyrian Alliance reports.

8319.name: Work with a Smile
8319.description: Life in Lowland Shore isn't all hardship. There's room for a little fun!
8319.requirement: Enjoy some of the lowlanders' favorite activities and pastimes.

bits.text: Help gather some mushrooms in the forest.
Help the lowlanders gather honey in the forest.
Save some cabbage from the vicious warclaw cubs.
Dance around the bonfire under the moon's glow.
Help the lowlanders tend to their gardens in Harvest Den.
Take a dip in the tundra hot springs.

8343.name: The Falling Star: Crafting List
8343.requirement: Gather materials and goods for creating a glove capable of retrieving the sunken spear.

8389.name: Revenge of the Doppleganger
8389.requirement: During the Path to Ascension meta-event in Elon Riverlands, defeat the legendary doppelganger.

8516.name: League Slayer—Conquest Season Forty-Four
8516.requirement: Defeat  players in ranked matches during Conquest Season Forty-Four.

8527.name: Local Response: Forging Steel (Weekly)
8527.requirement: Complete the Forging Steel cooperative mission, launched from the scrying pool in the Eye of the North.

8542.name: Conqueror of the Lake
8542.requirement: Conquer the titanspawn without going down.

8577.name: Demise of the Blood Phenom
8577.requirement: Stop Manikaz from completing his plan.

8587.name: Legendary Conqueror of Ura
8587.requirement: Defeat Ura after selecting a legendary challenge from the challenge mote.

8627.name: Home Sweet Homestead: Domain of Istan
8627.description: Homestead violators are subject to arrest and inquisition by the Mordant Crescent.
8627.requirement:
Complete events in the Domain of Istan. Group events will award more progress.

Earn bonus progress by completing the "Tear down the statue of Palawa Joko" event.

8652.name: (Annual) Heights of Glory
8652.requirement: While under the effects of a Fool's Tall Tonic, successfully complete events.

8718.name: Demolition Expert
8718.requirement: Help Statics Expert Zullos and his team destroy an ether tower.

8735.name: Vengeance Denied
8735.requirement: Prevent Lextalion from casting Keystone's Vengeance by breaking his defiance bar 5 times.

8741.name: Slumbering Lightborne Weapon Collector
8741.requirement: Bind all  Slumbering Lightborne weapon skins. These weapons are earned in Bava Nisos or by purchasing them from the Trading Post.
